title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [ATypI 2007 Brighton | Typophile Tribe Gathering](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908121413/http:/typophile.com/node/36815 "ATypI 2007 Brighton | Typophile Tribe Gathering")

As I announced in the [“OK. TypeCon’s over for now. Who’s going to ATypI?”](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908121413/http:/typophile.com/node/36064) thread, I (we?) will be organizing a Typophile Meet’n’Greet in Brighton. This as a reaction to the recurring complaints after every conference that fellow Typophiles didn’t get the chance to meet, often because they even didn’t know they were there.

I propose that the gathering takes place on Friday night after the ATypI Auction which starts at 18h45. I don’t know yet where we’ll have it, especially since I haven’t got a clue how many will want to join us. Maybe it would be an idea to have some registration. What does everyone think?
author: Bald Condensed
